item.disenchanter:experience_jar.name: Jar of Experience
msg.overload.txt: overload: disenchanting at full capacity is possible
msg.extract_from_jar.txt: - drink from the jar to extract some experience
msg.extract_all_from_jar.txt: - sneak while drinking from the jar to extract all stored experience
msg.insert_into_jar.txt: - sneak while punching with the jar to insert some experience
msg.overload_detailed.txt: overload: disenchanting at full capacity is possible
